title: Value range limit check
name: LGF_IsValueInLimits
description: The function checks whether a value is within a defined value range.

input.name: value
input.description: Value to be checked to determine whether it is within the defined value range

input.name: lowLimit
input.description: Low limit where the value is checked against to be greater

input.name: highLimit
input.description: High limit where the value is checked against to to be less

output.name: overHighLimit
output.description: TRUE if the “value” is greater than the upper limit value

output.name: belowLowLimit
output.description: TRUE, if the “value” is less than the lower limit value

output.name: error
output.description: FALSE: No error TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: 16#0000-16#7FFF: Status of the FB 16#8000-16#FFFF: Error identification

return_value.description: Return: TRUE if the “value” is in the value range (range of the set point)
